sentences: In this decision (FCCC/SBSTA/2001/L.17/Add.1), the COP encourages continuing IPCC work, including preparation of the Fourth Assessment Report, and also encourages Parties to make full use of the information in the TAR.
It urges Parties to continue providing financial support to the IPCC and to contribute to the IPCC trust fund to allow more developing country experts to participate in IPCC activities.
enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
